e)/peita mh\ 'ceurei=n du/nasqai th\n o(do/n;
h(mei=s ga/r, w)=ndres oi( paro/ntes e)n lo/gw|,
no/son nosou=men th\n e)nanti/an *sa/ka|:
o( me\n ga\r w)\n ou)k a)sto\s e)sbia/zetai,
h(mei=s de\ fulh=| kai\ ge/nei timw/menoi,
a)stoi\ met' a)stw=n, ou) sobou=ntos ou)deno\s

to\ mh\ ou) mega/lhn ei)=nai fu/sei keu)dai/mona
kai\ pa=si koinh\n e)napotei=sai xrh/mata.
oi( me\n ga\r ou)=n te/ttiges e(/na mh=n' h)\ du/o
e)pi\ tw=n kradw=n a)/|dous', *)aqhnai=oi d' a)ei\

dia\ tau=ta to/nde to\n ba/don badi/zomen,
kanou=n d' e)/xonte kai\ xu/tran kai\ murri/nas

o(/poi kaqidruqe/nte diagenoi/meq' a)/n.
o( de\ sto/los nw=|n e)sti para\ to\n *thre/a
to\n e)/popa, par' e)kei/nou puqe/sqai deome)nw,
ei)/ pou toiau/thn ei)=de po/lin h(=| 'pe/pteto.

sp.speaker: *kh=ruc
sp.p:
a)kou/ete lew/|: tou\s o(pli/tas nunmeni\
a)nelome/nous qw)/pl' a)pie/nai pa/lin oi)/kade,
skopei=n d' o(/ ti a)\n progra/fwmen e)n toi=s pinaki/ois.

sp.speaker: *xoro/s
sp.p:
dolero\n me\n a)ei\ kata\ pa/nta dh\ tro/pon
pe/fuken a)/nqrwpos: su\ d' o(/mws le/ge moi.
ta/xa ga\r tu/xois a)\n
xrhsto\n e)ceipw\n o(/ ti moi parora=|s, h)\
du/nami/n tina mei/zw
paraleipome/nhn u(p' e)mh=s freno\s a)cune/tou:
su\ de\ tou=q' ou(ra=|s le/g' e)s koino/n.
o(\ ga\r a)\n su\ tu/xh|s moi
a)gaqo\n pori/sas, tou=to koino\n e)/stai.

sp.speaker: *xoro/s
sp.p:
a)ll' e)f' o(/tw|per pra/gmati th\n sh\n h(/keis gnw/mhn a)napei/sas,
le/ge qarrh/sas: w(s ta\s sponda\s ou) mh\ pro/teroi parabw=men.

sp.speaker: *pisqe/tairos
sp.p:
kai\ mh
 o)rgw= nh\ to
 *di/a kai\ propefu/ratai lo/gos ei(=s moi,
o(

kata\ xeiro\s u(/dwr fere/tw taxu/ tis.

sp.speaker: *pisqe/tairos
sp.p:
ma\ *di/' a)lla\ le/gein zhtw= ti pa/lai me/ga kai\ larino\n e)/pos ti,

oi(/tines o)/ntes pro/teron basilh=s —

sp.speaker: *xoro/s
sp.p: h(mei=s basilh=s; ti/nos;

sp.speaker: *pisqe/tairos
sp.p:
u(mei=s
pa/ntwn o(po/s' e)/stin, e)mou= prw=ton, toudi/, kai\ tou= *dio\s au)tou=,
a)rxaio/teroi pro/teroi/ te *kro/nou kai\ *tita/nwn e)ge/nesqe,
kai\ gh=s.

sp.speaker: *xoro/s
sp.p: kai\ gh=s;

sp.speaker: *pisqe/tairos
sp.p: nh\ to\n *)apo/llw.

sp.speaker: *xoro/s
sp.p: touti\ ma\ *di/' ou)k e)pepu/smhn.

sp.speaker: *pisqe/tairos
sp.p:
a)maqh\s ga e)/fus kou) polupra/gmwn, ou)d' *ai)/swpon pepa/thkas,
o(\s e)/faske le/gwn korudo
 pa/ntwn prw/thn o)/rniqa gene/sqai,
prote/ran th=s gh=s, ka)/peita no/sw| to
 pate/r' au)th=s a)poqnh/|skein:
gh=n d' ou)k ei)=nai, to
 de\ prokei=sqai pemptai=on: th
 d' a)porou=san
u(p' a)mhxani/as to
 pate/r' au(th=s e)n th=| kefalh=| katoru/cai.

sp.speaker: *)euelpi/dhs
sp.p: o( path\r a)/ra th=s korudou= nuni\ kei=tai teqnew\s *kefalh=sin.

sp.speaker: *pisqe/tairos
sp.p:
ou)/koun dh=t' ei) pro/teroi me\n gh=s pro/teroi de\ qew=n e)ge/nonto,
w(s presbuta/twn au)tw=n o)/ntw=n o)rqw=s e)sq' h( basilei/a;

sp.speaker: *)euelpi/dhs
sp.p:
nh\ to\n *)apo/llw: pa/nu toi/nun xrh\ r(u/gxos bo/skein se to\ loipo/n:
ou)k a)podw/sei taxe/ws o( *zeu\s to\ skh=ptron tw=| drukola/pth|.

sp.speaker: *pisqe/tairos
sp.p:
w(s d' ou)xi\ qeoi\ toi/nun h)=rxon tw=n a)nqrw/pwn to\ palaio/n,
a)ll' o)/rniqes, ka)basi/leuon, po/ll' e)sti\ tekmh/ria tou/twn.
au)ti/ka d' u(mi=n prw=t' e)pidei/cw to\n a)lektruo/n', w(s e)tura/nnei
h)=rxe/ te *persw=n prw=ton pa/ntwn *darei/ou kai\ *megaba/zou,
w(/ste kalei=tai *persiko\s o)/rnis a)po\ th=s a)rxh=s e)/t' e)kei/nhs.

sp.speaker: *)euelpi/dhs
sp.p:
dia\ tau=t' a)/r' e)/xwn kai\ nu=n w(/sper basileu\s o( me/gas diaba/skei
e)pi\ th=s kefalh=s th\n kurbasi/an tw=n o)rni/qwn mo/nos o)rqh/n.

sp.speaker: *pisqe/tairos
sp.p:
ou(/tw d' i)/sxuse/ te kai\ me/gas h)=n to/te kai\ polu/s, w(/st' e)/ti kai\ nu=n
u(po\ th=s r(w/mhs th=s to/t' e)kei/nhs, o(po/tan mo/non o)/rqrion a)/|sh|,
a)naphdw=sin pa/ntes e)p' e)/rgon xalkh=s keramh=s skulode/yai
skuth=s balanh=s a)lfitamoiboi\ torneutoluraspidophgoi/:
oi( de\ badi/zous' u(podhsa/menoi nu/ktwr.

sp.speaker: *)euelpi/dhs
sp.p:
e)me\ tou=to/ g' e)rw/ta.
xlai=nan ga\r a)pw/les' o( moxqhro\s *frugi/wn e)ri/wn dia\ tou=ton.
e)s deka/thn ga/r pote paidari/ou klhqei\s u(pe/pinon e)n a)/stei,
ka)/rti kaqhu=don, kai\ pri\n deipnei=n tou\s a)/llous ou(=tos a)/r' h)=|sen:
ka)gw\ nomi/sas o)/rqron e)xw/roun *)alimounta/de, ka)/rti proku/ptw
e)/cw tei/xous kai\ lwpodu/ths pai/ei r(opa/lw| me to\ nw=ton:
ka)gw\ pi/ptw me/llw te boa=n, o( d' a)pe/blise qoi)ma/tio/n mou.

sp.speaker: *pisqe/tairos
sp.p: i)kti=nos d' ou)=n tw=n *(ellh/nwn h)=rxen to/te ka)basi/leuen.

sp.speaker: *xoro/s
sp.p: tw=n *(ellh/nwn;

sp.speaker: *pisqe/tairos
sp.p:
kai\ kate/deice/n g' ou(=tos prw=tos basileu/wn
prokulindei=sqai toi=s i)kti/nois.

sp.speaker: *)euelpi/dhs
sp.p:
nh\ to
 *dio/nuson, e)gw\ gou=n
e)kulindou/mhn i)kti=non i)dw/n: ka)=|q' u(/ptios w)
 a)naxa/skwn
o)bolo
 katebro/xqisa: ka)=|ta keno
 to
 qu/lakon oi)/kad' a)fei=lkon.

sp.speaker: *pisqe/tairos
sp.p:
*ai)gu/ptou d' au)= kai\ *foini/khs pa/shs ko/kkuc basileu\s h)=n:
xw)po/q' o( ko/kkuc ei)/poi ko/kku, to/t' a)\n oi( *foi/nikes a(/pantes
tou\s purou\s a)\n kai\ ta\s kriqa\s e)n toi=s pedi/ois e)qe/rizon.

sp.speaker: *)euelpi/dhs
sp.p: tou=t' a)/r' e)kei=n' h)=n tou)/pos a)lhqw=s: ko/kkuywloi\ pedi/onde.

sp.speaker: *pisqe/tairos
sp.p:
h)=rxon d' ou(/tw sfo/dra th\n a)rxh/n, w(/st' ei)/ tis kai\ basileu/oi
e)n tai=s po/lesin tw=n *(ellh/nwn *)agame/mnwn h)\ *mene/laos,
e)pi\ tw=n skh/ptrwn e)ka/qht' o)/rnis mete/xwn o(/ ti dwrodokoi/h.

sp.speaker: *)euelpi/dhs
sp.p:
touti\ toi/nun ou)k h)/|dh 'gw/: kai\ dh=ta/ m' e)la/mbane qau=ma,
o(po/t' e)ce/lqoi *pri/amo/s tis e)/xwn o)/rnin e)n toi=si tragw|doi=s,
o( d' a)/r' ei(sth/kei to\n *lusikra/th thrw=n o(/ ti dwrodokoi/h.

sp.speaker: *pisqe/tairos
sp.p:
o(\ de\ deino/tato/n g' e)sti\n a(pa/ntwn, o( *zeu\s ga\r o( nu=n basileu/wn
ai)eto\n o)/rnin e(/sthken e)/xwn e)pi\ th=s kefalh=s basileu\s w)/n,
h( d' au)= quga/thr glau=x', o( d' *)apo/llwn w(/sper qera/pwn i(e/raka.

sp.speaker: *)euelpi/dhs
sp.p: nh\ th\n *dh/mhtr' eu)= tau=ta le/geis. ti/nos ou(/neka tau=t' a)/r' e)/xousin;

sp.speaker: *pisqe/tairos
sp.p:
i(/n' o(/tan qu/wn tis e)/peit' au)toi=s e)s th\n xei=r', w(s no/mos e)sti/n,
ta\ spla/gxna didw=|, tou= *dio\s au)toi\ pro/teroi ta\ spla/gxna la/bwsin.
w)/mnu t' ou)dei\s to/t' a)\n a)nqrw/pwn qeo/n, a)ll' o)/rniqas a(/pantes:
*la/mpwn d' o)/mnus' e)/ti kai\ nuni\ to\n xh=n', o(/tan e)capata=| ti.
ou(/tws u(ma=s pa/ntes pro/teron mega/lous a(gi/ous t' e)no/mizon,

sp.speaker: *pisqe/tairos
sp.p:
nu=n d' a)ndra/pod' h)liqi/ous *mana=s:
w(/sper d' h)/dh tou\s mainome/nous
ba/llous' u(ma=s, ka)n toi=s i(eroi=s
pa=s tis e)f' u(mi=n o)rniqeuth\s
i(/sthsi bro/xous pagi/das r(a/bdous
e(/rkh nefe/las di/ktua phkta/s:
ei)=ta labo/ntes pwlou=s' a(qro/ous:
oi( d' w)nou=ntai blima/zontes:
kou)d' ou)=n, ei)/per tau=ta dokei= dra=n,
o)pthsa/menoi pare/qenq' u(ma=s,
a)ll' e)piknw=sin turo\n e)/laion
si/lfion o)/cos kai\ tri/yantes
kata/xusm' e(/teron gluku\ kai\ liparo/n,
ka)/peita kateske/dasan qermo\n
tou=to kaq' u(mw=n
au)tw=n w(/sper kenebrei/wn.

sp.speaker: *xoro/s
sp.p:
polu\ dh\ polu\ dh\ xalepwta/tous lo/gous
h)/negkas a)/nqrwf'. w(s e)da/krusa/ g' e)mw=n
pate/rwn ka/khn, oi(\
ta/sde ta\s tima\s progo/nwn parado/ntwn
e)p' e)mou= kate/lusan.
su\ de/ moi kata\ dai/mona kai/ tina suntuxi/an
a)gaqh\n h(/keis e)moi\ swth/r.
a)naqei\s ga\r e)gw/ soi
ta\ neotti/a ka)mauto\n oi)kh/sw.

sp.speaker: *xoro/s
sp.p:
a)ll' o(/ ti xrh\ dra=n, su\ di/daske parw/n: w(s zh=n ou)k a)/cion h(mi=n,
ei) mh\ komiou/meqa panti\ tro/pw| th\n h(mete/ran basilei/an.

sp.speaker: *pisqe/tairos
sp.p:
kai\ dh\ toi/nun prw=ta dida/skw mi/an o)rni/qwn po/lin ei)=nai,
ka)/peita to\n a)e/ra pa/nta ku/klw| kai\ pa=n touti\ to\ metacu\
periteixi/zein mega/lais pli/nqois o)ptai=s w(/sper *babulw=na.

sp.speaker: *)/epoy
sp.p: w)= *kebrio/nh kai\ *porfuri/wn w(s smerdale/on to\ po/lisma.

sp.speaker: *pisqe/tairos
sp.p:
ka)/peit' h)\n tou=t' e)panesth/kh|, th\n a)rxh\n to\n *di/' a)paitei=n:
ka)\n me\n mh\ fh=| mhd' e)qelh/sh| mhd' eu)qu\s gnwsimaxh/sh|,
i(ero\n po/lemon prwu)da=n au)tw=|, kai\ toi=si qeoi=sin a)peipei=n
dia\ th=s xw/ras th=s u(mete/ras e)stuko/si mh\ diafoita=n,
w(/sper pro/teron moixeu/sontes ta\s *)alkmh/nas kate/bainon
kai\ ta\s *)alo/pas kai\ ta\s *seme/las: h)/nper d' e)pi/ws', e)piba/llein
sfragi=d' au)toi=s e)pi\ th\n ywlh/n, i(/na mh\ binw=s' e)/t' e)kei/nas.
toi=s d' a)nqrw/pois o)/rnin e(/teron pe/myai kh/ruka keleu/w,
w(s o)rni/qwn basileuo/ntwn qu/ein o)/rnisi to\ loipo/n,
ka)/peita qeoi=s u(/steron au)=qis: prosnei/masqai de\ prepo/ntws
toi=si qeoi=sin tw=n o)rni/qwn o(\s a)\n a(rmo/tth| kaq' e(/kaston:
h)\n *)afrodi/th| qu/h|, purou\s o)/rniqi falhri/di qu/ein:
h)\n de\ *poseidw=ni/ tis oi)=n qu/h|, nh/tth| purou\s kaqagi/zein:
h)\n d' *(hrakle/ei qu/h| ti, la/rw| nastou\s qu/ein melitou=ntas:
ka)\n *dii\ qu/h| basilei= krio/n, basileu/s e)st' o)rxi/los o)/rnis,
w(=| prote/rw| dei= tou= *dio\s au)tou= se/rfon e)no/rxhn sfagia/zein.

sp.speaker: *)euelpi/dhs
sp.p: h(/sqhn se/rfw| sfagiazome/nw|. bronta/tw nu=n o( me/gas *za/n.

sp.speaker: *xoro/s
sp.p:
kai\ pw=s h(ma=s nomiou=si qeou\s a)/nqrwpoi kou)xi\ koloiou/s,
oi(\ peto/mesqa pte/ruga/s t' e)/xomen;

sp.speaker: *pisqe/tairos
sp.p:
lhrei=s: kai\ nh\ *di/' o(/ g' *(ermh=s
pe/tetai qeo\s w)\n pte/ruga/s te forei=, ka)/lloi ge qeoi\ pa/nu polloi/.
au)ti/ka *ni/kh pe/tetai pteru/goin xrusai=n kai\ nh\ *di/' *)/erws ge:
*(/hrhn de/ g' *(/omhros e)/fask' i)ke/lhn ei)=nai trh/rwni pelei/h|.

sp.speaker: *)euelpi/dhs
sp.p: o( *zeu\s d' h(mi=n ou) bronth/sas pe/myei ptero/enta kerauno/n;

sp.speaker: *pisqe/tairos
sp.p:
h)\n d' ou)=n u(ma=s me\n u(p' a)gnoi/as ei)=nai nomi/swsi to\ mhde/n,
tou/tous de\ qeou\s tou\s e)n *)olu/mpw| to/te xrh\ strou/qwn ne/fos a)rqe\n
kai\ spermolo/gwn e)k tw=n a)grw=n to\ spe/rm' au)tw=n a)naka/yai:
ka)/peit' au)toi=s h( *dhmh/thr purou\s peinw=si metrei/tw.

sp.speaker: *)euelpi/dhs
sp.p: ou)k e)qelh/sei ma\ *di/', a)ll' o)/yei profa/seis au)th\n pare/xousan.

sp.speaker: *pisqe/tairos
sp.p:
oi( d' au)= ko/rakes tw=n zeugari/wn, oi(=sin th\n gh=n katarou=sin,
kai\ tw=n proba/twn tou\s o)fqalmou\s e)kkoya/ntwn e)pi\ pei/ra|:
ei)=q' o(/ g' *)apo/llwn i)atro/s g' w)\n i)a/sqw: misqoforei= de/.

sp.speaker: *)euelpi/dhs
sp.p: mh\ pri/n g' a)\n e)gw\ tw\ boidari/w tw)mw\ prw/tist' a)podw=mai.

sp.speaker: *pisqe/tairos
sp.p:
h)\n d' h(gw=ntai se\ qeo\n se\ bi/on se\ de\ gh=n se\ *kro/non se\ *poseidw=,
a)ga/q' au)toi=sin pa/nta pare/stai.

sp.speaker: *)/epoy
sp.p: le/ge dh/ moi tw=n a)gaqw=n e(/n.

sp.speaker: *pisqe/tairos
sp.p:
prw=ta me\n au)tw=n ta\s oi)na/nqas oi( pa/rnopes ou) kate/dontai,
a)lla\ glaukw=n lo/xos ei(=s au)tou\s kai\ kerxnh/|dwn e)pitri/yei.
ei)=q' oi( kni=pes kai\ yh=nes a)ei\ ta\s suka=s ou) kate/dontai,
a)ll' a)nale/cei pa/ntas kaqarw=s au)tou\s a)ge/lh mi/a kixlw=n.

sp.speaker: *)/epoy
sp.p: ploutei=n de\ po/qen dw/somen au)toi=s; kai\ ga\r tou/tou sfo/dr' e)rw=sin.

sp.speaker: *pisqe/tairos
sp.p:
ta\ me/tall' au)toi=s manteuome/nois ou(=toi dw/sousi ta\ xrhsta/,
ta/s t' e)mpori/as ta\s kerdale/as pro\s to\n ma/ntin katerou=sin,
w(/st' a)polei=tai tw=n nauklh/rwn ou)dei/s.

sp.speaker: *)/epoy
sp.p: pw=s ou)k a)polei=tai;

sp.speaker: *pisqe/tairos
sp.p:
proerei= tis a)ei\ tw=n o)rni/qwn manteuome/nw| peri\ tou= plou=:
nuni\ mh\ plei=, xeimw\n e)/stai: nuni\ plei=, ke/rdos e)pe/stai.

sp.speaker: *)euelpi/dhs
sp.p: gau=lon ktw=mai kai\ nauklhrw=, kou)k a)\n mei/naimi par' u(mi=n.

sp.speaker: *pisqe/tairos
sp.p:
tou\s qhsaurou/s t' au)toi=s dei/cous' ou(\s oi( pro/teroi kate/qento
tw=n a)rguri/wn: ou(=toi ga i)/sasi: le/gousi de/ toi ta/de pa/ntes,
ou)dei\s oi)=den to
 qhsauro
 to
 e)mo
 plh
 ei)/ tis a)/r' o)/rnis.

sp.speaker: *)euelpi/dhs

sp.speaker: *)/epoy
sp.p:

h)\ paida/ri' o)/nt' a)poqnh/|skein dei=;

sp.p: ai)boi= pollw=| krei/ttous ou(=toi tou= *dio\s h(mi=n basileu/ein.

ou) ga\r pollw=|;

e)pauxh/sas de\ toi=si soi=s lo/gois

o(mo/fronas lo/gous dikai/ous
a)do/lous o(si/ous

sp.p:
a)ll' o(/sa me\n dei= r(w/mh| pra/ttein, e)pi\ tau=ta tetaco/meq' h(mei=s:
o(/sa de\ gnw/mh| dei= bouleu/ein, e)pi\ soi\ ta/de pa/nt' a)na/keitai.

sp.p:
kai\ mh\n ma\ to\n *di/' ou)xi\ nusta/zein e)/ti

a)ll' w(s ta/xista dei= ti dra=n: prw=ton de/ ge

kai\ ta)ma\ ka/rfh kai\ ta\ paro/nta fru/gana,

a)lla\ r(a/|dion.

sp.p:
mhde\n fobhqh=|s: e)/sti ga/r ti r(izi/on,
o(\ diatrago/nt' e)/sesqon e)pterwme/nw.

sp.speaker: *pisqe/tairos
sp.p:
ou(/tw me\n ei)si/wmen. a)/ge dh\ *canqi/a
kai\ *mano/dwre lamba/nete ta\ strw/mata.

sp.speaker: *xoro/s
sp.p: ou(=tos se\ kalw=, se\ le/gw.

sp.speaker: *)/epoy
sp.p: ti/ kalei=s;

sp.speaker: *xoro/s
sp.p:
tou/tous me\n a)/gwn meta\ sautou=
a)ri/stison eu)=: th\n d' h(dumelh= cu/mfwnon a)hdo/na *mou/sais
kata/leif' h(mi=n deu=r' e)kbiba/sas, i(/na pai/swmen met' e)kei/nhs.

sp.speaker: *pisqe/tairos
sp.p:
w)= tou=to mentoi nh\ *di/' au)toi=sin piqou=:
e)kbi/bason e)k tou= bouto/mou tou)rni/qion.

sp.p:

kai\ nw\ qeasw/mesqa th\n a)hdo/na.

sp.speaker: *)/epoy
sp.p:
a)ll' ei) dokei= sfw=|n, tau=ta xrh\ dra=n. h( *pro/knh
e)/kbaine kai\ sauth\n e)pidei/knu toi=s ce/nois.

sp.speaker: *pisqe/tairos
sp.p:
w)= *zeu= poluti/mhq' w(s kalo\n tou)rni/qion,
w(s d' a(palo/n, w(s de\ leuko/n.

sp.p:
a)=ra/ g' oi)=sq' o(/ti
e)gw\ diamhri/zoim' a)\n au)th\n h(de/ws;

sp.p: o(/son d' e)/xei to\n xruso/n, w(/sper parqe/nos.

sp.p:
a)ll' w(/sper w)|o\n nh\ *di/' a)pole/yanta xrh\
a)po\ th=s kefalh=s to\ le/mma ka)=|q' ou(/tw filei=n.

sp.speaker: *)/epoy
sp.p: i)/wmen.

sp.speaker: *pisqe/tairos
sp.p: h(gou= dh\ su\ nw=|n tu/xa)gaqh=|.

sp.speaker: *xoro/s
sp.p:
w)= fi/lh, w)= couqh/,
w)= fi/ltaton o)rne/wn
pa/ntwn, cu/nnome tw=n e)mw=n
u(/mnwn, cu/ntrof' a)hdoi=,
h)=lqes h)=lqes w)/fqhs,
h(du\n fqo/ggon e)moi\ fe/rous'.
a)ll' w)= kallibo/an kre/kous'
au)lo\n fqe/gmasin h)rinoi=s,
a)/rxou tw=n a)napai/stwn.

sp.speaker: *xoro/s
sp.p:
a)/ge dh\ fu/sin a)/ndres a)mauro/bioi, fu/llwn genea=| proso/moioi,
o)ligodrane/es, pla/smata phlou=, skioeide/a fu=l' a)menhna/,
a)pth=nes e)fhme/rioi talaoi\ brotoi\ a)ne/res ei)kelo/neiroi,
prose/xete to\n nou=n toi=s a)qana/tois h(mi=n toi=s ai)e\n e)ou=sin,
toi=s ai)qeri/ois toi=sin a)gh/rw|s toi=s a)/fqita mhdome/noisin,
i(/n' a)kou/santes pa/nta par' h(mw=n o)rqw=s peri\ tw=n metew/rwn.
fu/sin oi)wnw=n ge/nesi/n te qew=n potamw=n t' *)ere/bous te *xa/ous te
ei)do/tes o)rqw=s, *prodi/kw| par' e)mou= kla/ein ei)/phte to\ loipo/n.
*xa/os h)=n kai\ *nu\c *)/erebo/s te me/lan prw=ton kai\ *ta/rtaros eu)ru/s,
gh= d' ou)d' a)h\r ou)d' ou)rano\s h)=n: *)ere/bous d' e)n a)pei/rosi ko/lpois
ti/ktei prw/tiston u(phne/mion *nu\c h( melano/pteros w)|o/n,
e)c ou)= peritellome/nais w(/rais e)/blasten *)/erws o( poqeino/s,
sti/lbwn nw=ton pteru/goin xrusai=n, ei)kw\s a)nemw/kesi di/nais.
ou(=tos de\ *xa/ei ptero/enti migei\s nuxi/w| kata\ *ta/rtaron eu)ru\n
e)neo/tteusen ge/nos h(me/teron, kai\ prw=ton a)nh/gagen e)s fw=s.
pro/teron d' ou)k h)=n ge/nos a)qana/twn, pri\n *)/erws cune/meicen a(/panta:
cummignume/nwn d' e(te/rwn e(te/rois ge/net' ou)rano\s w)keano/s te
kai\ gh= pa/ntwn te qew=n maka/rwn ge/nos a)/fqiton. w)=de me/n e)smen
polu\ presbu/tatoi pa/ntwn maka/rwn. h(mei=s d' w(s e)sme\n *)/erwtos
polloi=s dh=lon: peto/mesqa/ te ga\r kai\ toi=sin e)rw=si su/nesmen:
pollou\s de\ kalou\s a)pomwmoko/tas pai=das pro\s te/rmasin w(/ras
dia\ th\n i)sxu\n th\n h(mete/ran diemh/risan a)/ndres e)rastai/,
o( me\n o)/rtuga dou\s o( de\ porfuri/wn' o( de\ xh=n' o( de\ *persiko\n o)/rnin.

sp.speaker: *xoro/s
sp.p:
pa/nta de\ qnhtoi=s e)sti\n a)f' h(mw=n tw=n o)rni/qwn ta\ me/gista.
prw=ta me\n w(/ras fai/nomen h(mei=s h)=ros xeimw=nos o)pw/ras:
spei/rein me/n, o(/tan ge/ranos krw/zous' e)s th\n *libu/hn metaxwrh=|.
kai\ phda/lion to/te nauklh/rw| fra/zei krema/santi kaqeu/dein,
ei)=ta d' *)ore/sth| xlai=nan u(fai/nein, i(/na mh\ r(igw=n a)podu/h|.
i)kti=nos d' au)= meta\ tau=ta fanei\s e(te/ran w(/ran a)pofai/nei,
h(ni/ka pektei=n w(/ra proba/twn po/kon h)rino/n: ei)=ta xelidw/n,
o(/te xrh\ xlai=nan pwlei=n h)/dh kai\ lhda/rio/n ti pri/asqai.
e)sme\n d' u(mi=n *)/ammwn *delfoi\ *dwdw/nh *foi=bos *)apo/llwn.
e)lqo/ntes ga\r prw=ton e)p' o)/rnis ou(/tw pro\s a(/panta tre/pesqe,
pro/s t' e)mpori/an, kai\ pro\s bio/tou kth=sin, kai\ pro\s ga/mon a)ndro/s.
o)/rnin te nomi/zete pa/nq' o(/saper peri\ mantei/as diakri/nei:
fh/mh g' u(mi=n o)/rnis e)sti/, ptarmo/n t' o)/rniqa kalei=te,
cu/mbolon o)/rnin, fwnh\n o)/rnin, qera/pont' o)/rnin, o)/non o)/rnin.
a)=r' ou) fanerw=s h(mei=s u(mi=n e)sme\n mantei=os *)apo/llwn;

sp.speaker: *xoro/s
sp.p:
h)\n ou)=n h(ma=s nomi/shte qeou/s,
e(/cete xrh=sqai ma/ntesi *mou/sais
au)/rais w(/rais xeimw=ni qe/rei
metri/w| pni/gei: kou)k a)podra/ntes
kaqedou/meq' a)/nw semnuno/menoi
para\ tai=s nefe/lais w(/sper xw) *zeu/s:
a)lla\ paro/ntes dw/somen u(mi=n
au)toi=s, paisi/n, pai/dwn paisi/n,
plouqugiei/an
eu)daimoni/an bi/on ei)rh/nhn
neo/thta ge/lwta xorou\s qali/as
ga/la t' o)rni/qwn. w(/ste pare/stai
kopia=n u(mi=n u(po\ tw=n a)gaqw=n:
ou(/tw plouth/sete pa/ntes.

sp.speaker: *xoro/s
sp.p:
*mou=sa loxmai/a,
tio\ tio\ tio\ tio\ tio\ tio\ tioti/gc,
poiki/lh, meq' h(=s e)gw\
na/paisi kai\ korufai=s e)n o)rei/ais,
tio\ tio\ tio\ tioti/gc,
i(zo/menos meli/as e)pi\ fulloko/mou,
tio\ tio\ tio\ tioti/gc,
di' e)mh=s ge/nuos couqh=s mele/wn
*pani\ no/mous i(erou\s a)nafai/nw
semna/ te mhtri\ xoreu/mat' o)rei/a|,
totototototototototi/gc,
e)/nqen w(sterei\ me/litta
*fru/nixos a)mbrosi/wn mele/wn a)pebo/sketo karpo\n a)ei\
fe/rwn glukei=an w)|da/n.
tio\ tio\ tio\ tioti/gc.

sp.speaker: *xoro/s
sp.p:
ei) met' o)rni/qwn tis u(mw=n w)= qeatai\ bou/letai
diaple/kein zw=n h(de/ws to\ loipo/n, w(s h(ma=s i)/tw.
o(/sa ga/r e)stin e)nqa/d' ai)sxra\ tw=| no/mw| kratou/mena,
tau=ta pa/nt' e)sti\n par' h(mi=n toi=sin o)/rnisin kala/.
ei) ga\r e)nqa/d' e)sti\n ai)sxro\n to\n pate/ra tu/ptein no/mw|,
tou=t' e)kei= kalo\n par' h(mi=n e)stin, h)/n tis tw=| patri\
prosdramw\n ei)/ph| pata/cas, ai)=re plh=ktron, ei) maxei=.
ei) de\ tugxa/nei tis u(mw=n drape/ths e)stigme/nos,
a)ttaga=s ou(=tos par' h(mi=n poiki/los keklh/setai.
ei) de\ tugxa/nei tis w)\n *fru\c mhde\n h)=tton *spinqa/rou,
frugi/los o)/rnis e)nqa/d' e)/stai, tou= *filh/monos ge/nous.
ei) de\ dou=lo/s e)sti kai\ *ka\r w(/sper *)echkesti/dhs,
fusa/tw pa/ppous par' h(mi=n, kai\ fanou=ntai fra/teres.
ei) d' o( *peisi/ou prodou=nai toi=s a)ti/mois ta\s pu/las
bou/letai, pe/rdic gene/sqw, tou= patro\s neotti/on:
w(s par' h(mi=n ou)de\n ai)sxro/n e)stin e)kperdiki/sai.

sp.speaker: *xoro/s
sp.p:
toia/de ku/knoi,
tio\ tio\ tia\ tio\ tio\ tioti/gc,
summigh= boh\n o(mou=
pteroi=s kre/kontes i)/akxon *)apo/llw,
tio\ tio\ tio\ tioti/gc,
o)/xqw| e)fezo/menoi par' *(/ebron potamo/n,
tio\ tio\ tio\ tioti/gc,
dia\ d' ai)qe/rion ne/fos h)=lqe boa/:
pth=ce de\ fu=la/ te poiki/la qhrw=n,
ku/mata/ t' e)/sbese nh/nemos ai)/qrh,
totototototototototi/gc:
pa=s d' e)pektu/phs' *)/olumpos:
ei(=le de\ qa/mbos a)/naktas: *)olumpia/des de\ me/los *xa/rites
*mou=sai/ t' e)pwlo/lucan.
tio\ tio\ tio\ tioti/gc.

sp.speaker: *xoro/s
sp.p:
ou)de/n e)st' a)/meinon ou)d' h(/dion h)\ fu=sai ptera/.
au)ti/x' u(mw=n tw=n qeatw=n ei)/ tis h(=n u(po/pteros,
ei)=ta peinw=n toi=s xoroi=si tw=n tragw|dw=n h)/xqeto,
e)kpto/menos a)\n ou(=tos h)ri/sthsen e)lqw\n oi)/kade,
ka)=|t' a)\n e)mplhsqei\s e)f' h(ma=s au)=qis au)= kate/pteto.
ei)/ te *patroklei/dhs tis u(mw=n tugxa/nei xezhtiw=n,
ou)k a)\n e)ci/disen e)s qoi)ma/tion, a)ll' a)ne/pteto,
ka)popardw\n ka)napneu/sas au)=qis au)= kate/pteto:
ei)/ te moixeu/wn tis u(mw=n e)stin o(/stis tugxa/nei,
ka)=|q' o(ra=| to\n a)/ndra th=s gunaiko\s e)n bouleutikw=|,
ou(=tos a)\n pa/lin par' u(mw=n pterugi/sas a)ne/pteto,
ei)=ta binh/sas e)kei=qen au)=qis au)= kate/pteto.
a)=r' u(po/pteron gene/sqai panto/s e)stin a)/cion;
w(s *dieitre/fhs ge putinai=a mo/non e)/xwn ptera\
h(|re/qh fu/larxos, ei)=q' i(/pparxos, ei)=t' e)c ou)deno\s
mega/la pra/ttei ka)sti\ nuni\ couqo\s i(ppalektruw/n.

sp.speaker: *pisqe/tairos
sp.p:
tauti\ toiauti/: ma\ *di/' e)gw\ me\n pra=gma/ pw
geloio/teron ou)k ei)=don ou)depw/pote.

sp.p: e)pi\ tw=| gela=|s;

e)nteuqeni\

i)ou\ i)ou/:

sp.speaker: *)euelpi/dhs
*pisqe/tairos

kai\ lw=|ston me\n ou)=n
to\ *fle/gras pedi/on, i(/n' oi( qeoi\ tou\s ghgenei=s
a)lazoneuo/menoi kaquperhko/ntisan.

sp.speaker: *)/epoy
sp.p:
liparo\n to\ xrh=ma th=s po/lews. ti/s dai\ qeo\s
poliou=xos e)/stai; tw=| canou=men to\n pe/plon;

sp.speaker: *)euelpi/dhs
sp.p: ti/ d' ou)k *)aqhnai/an e)w=men *polia/da;

sp.speaker: *pisqe/tairos
*)euelpi/dhs

sp.speaker: *)/epoy
sp.p:
o)/rnis a)f' h(mw=n tou= ge/nous tou= *persikou=,
o(/sper le/getai deino/tatos ei)=nai pantaxou=
*)/arews neotto/s.

sp.speaker: *)euelpi/dhs
sp.p:
w)= neotte\ de/spota:
w(s d' o( qeo\s e)pith/deios oi)kei=n e)pi\ petrw=n.

sp.speaker: *pisqe/tairos
sp.p:
a)/ge nun su\ me\n ba/dize pro\s to\n a)e/ra
kai\ toi=si teixi/zousi paradiako/nei,
xa/likas parafo/rei, phlo\n a)podu\s o)/rgason,
leka/nhn a)ne/negke, kata/pes' a)po\ th=s kli/makos,
fu/lakas kata/sthsai, to\ pu=r e)/gkrupt' a)ei/,
kwdwnoforw=n peri/trexe kai\ ka/qeud' e)kei=:
kh/ruka de\ pe/myon to\n me\n e)s qeou\s a)/nw,
e(/teron d' a)/nwqen a)=u par' a)nqrw/pous ka/tw,
ka)kei=qen au)=qis par' e)me/.

sp.speaker: *)euelpi/dhs
sp.p:
su\ de/ g' au)tou= me/nwn

sp.speaker: *xoro/s
sp.p:
th=|de me/ntoi qh)me/ra| ma/list' e)panagoreu/etai,
h)\n a)poktei/nh| tis u(mw=n *diago/ran to\n *mh/lion,
lamba/nein ta/lanton, h)/n te tw=n tura/nnwn ti/s tina
tw=n teqnhko/twn a)poktei/nh|, ta/lanton lamba/nein.
boulo/mesq' ou)=n nun a)neipei=n tau)ta\ xh)mei=s e)nqa/de.
h)\n a)poktei/nh| tis u(mw=n *filokra/th to\n *strou/qion,
lh/yetai ta/lanton, h)\n de\ zw=nta/ g' a)ga/gh|, te/ttara,
o(/ti sunei/rwn tou\s spi/nous pwlei= kaq' e(pta\ tou)bolou=,
ei)=ta fusw=n ta\s ki/xlas dei/knusi kai\ lumai/netai,
toi=s te koyi/xoisin e)s ta\s r(i=nas e)gxei= ta\ ptera/,
ta\s peristera/s q' o(moi/ws cullabw\n ei(/rcas e)/xei,
ka)panagka/zei paleu/ein dedeme/nas e)n diktu/w|.
tau=ta boulo/mesq' a)neipei=n: kei)/ tis o)/rniqas tre/fei
ei(rgme/nous u(mw=n e)n au)lh=|, fra/zomen meqie/nai.
h)\n de\ mh\ pi/qhsqe, sullhfqe/ntes u(po\ tw=n o)rne/wn
au)=qis u(mei=s au)= par' h(mi=n dedeme/noi paleu/sete.

sp.p:
eu)/daimon fu=lon pthnw=n
oi)wnw=n, oi(\ xeimw=nos me\n
xlai/nas ou)k a)mpisxnou=ntai:
ou)d' au)= qermh\ pni/gous h(ma=s
a)kti\s thlaugh\s qa/lpei:
a)ll' a)nqhrw=n leimw/nwn
fu/llwn t' e)n ko/lpois nai/w,
h(ni/k' a)\n o( qespe/sios o)cu\ me/los a)xe/tas
qa/lpesi meshmbrinoi=s h(liomanh\s boa=|.
xeima/zw d' e)n koi/lois a)/ntrois
nu/mfaois ou)rei/ais cumpai/zwn:
h)rina/ te bosko/meqa parqe/nia
leuko/trofa mu/rta *xari/twn te khpeu/mata.

sp.speaker: *xoro/s
sp.p:
toi=s kritai=s ei)pei=n ti boulo/mesqa th=s ni/khs pe/ri,
o(/s' a)ga/q', h)\n kri/nwsin h(ma=s, pa=sin au)toi=s dw/somen,
w(/ste krei/ttw dw=ra pollw=| tw=n *)aleca/ndrou labei=n.
prw=ta me\n ga\r ou(= ma/lista pa=s krith\s e)fi/etai,
glau=kes u(ma=s ou)/pot' e)pilei/yousi *laureiwtikai/:
a)ll' e)noikh/sousin e)/ndon, e)/n te toi=s ballanti/ois
e)nneotteu/sousi ka)kle/yousi mikra\ ke/rmata.
ei)=ta pro\s tou/toisin w(/sper e)n i(eroi=s oi)kh/sete:
ta\s ga\r u(mw=n oi)ki/as e)re/yomen pro\s ai)eto/n:
ka)\n laxo/ntes a)rxi/dion ei)=q' a(rpa/sai bou/lhsqe/ ti,
o)cu\n i(eraki/skon e)s ta\s xei=ras u(mi=n dw/somen.
h)\n de/ pou deipnh=te, prhgorew=nas u(mi=n pe/myomen.
h)\n de\ mh\ kri/nhte, xalkeu/esqe mhni/skous forei=n
w(/sper a)ndria/ntes: w(s u(mw=n o(\s a)\n mh\ mh=n' e)/xh|,
o(/tan e)/xhte xlani/da leukh/n, to/te ma/lisq' ou(/tw di/khn
dw/seq' h(mi=n, pa=si toi=s o)/rnisi katatilw/menoi.

sp.speaker: *pisqe/tairos
sp.p:
ta\ me\n i(e/r' h(mi=n e)stin w)=rniqes kala/:
a)ll' w(s a)po\ tou= tei/xous pa/restin a)/ggelos
ou)dei/s, o(/tou peuso/meqa ta)kei= pra/gmata.
a)ll' ou(tosi\ tre/xei tis *)alfeio\n pne/wn.

sp.speaker: *)/aggelos *a
sp.p:
pou= pou= 'sti, pou= pou= pou= 'sti, pou= pou= pou= 'sti pou=,
pou= *pisqe/tairo/s e)stin a(/rxwn;

sp.speaker: *pisqe/tairos
sp.p: ou(tosi/.

sp.speaker: *)/aggelos *a
sp.p: e)cw|kodo/mhtai/ soi to\ tei=xos.

sp.speaker: *pisqe/tairos
sp.p: eu)= le/geis.

sp.speaker: *)/aggelos *a
sp.p:
ka/lliston e)/rgon kai\ megaloprepe/staton:
w(/st' a)\n e)pa/nw me\n *proceni/dhs o( *kompaseu\s
kai\ *qeoge/nhs e)nanti/w du/' a(/rmate,
i(/ppwn u(po/ntwn me/geqos o(/son o( dou/rios,
u(po\ tou= pla/tous a)\n parelasai/thn.

sp.speaker: *pisqe/tairos
sp.p: *(hra/kleis.

sp.speaker: *)/aggelos *a
sp.p:
to\ de\ mh=ko/s e)sti, kai\ ga\r e)me/trhs' au)/t' e)gw/,
e(katontoro/guion.

sp.speaker: *pisqe/tairos
sp.p:
w)= *po/seidon tou= ma/krous.
ti/nes w)|kodo/mhsan au)to\ thlikoutoni/;

sp.speaker: *)/aggelos *a
sp.p:
o)/rniqes, ou)dei\s a)/llos, ou)k *ai)gu/ptios
plinqofo/ros, ou) liqourgo/s, ou) te/ktwn parh=n,
a)ll' au)to/xeires, w(/ste qauma/zein e)me/.
e)k me/n ge *libu/hs h(=kon w(s trismu/riai
ge/ranoi qemeli/ous katapepwkui=ai li/qous.
tou/tous d' e)tu/kizon ai( kre/kes toi=s r(u/gxesin.
e(/teroi d' e)plinqofo/roun pelargoi\ mu/rioi:
u(/dwr d' e)fo/roun ka/twqen e)s to\n a)e/ra
oi( xaradrioi\ kai\ ta)/lla poto/mi' o)/rnea.

sp.speaker: *pisqe/tairos
sp.p: e)phlofo/roun d' au)toi=si ti/nes;

sp.speaker: *)/aggelos *a
sp.p:
e)rwdioi\
leka/naisi.

sp.speaker: *pisqe/tairos
sp.p: to\n de\ phlo\n e)neba/llonto pw=s;

sp.speaker: *)/aggelos *a
sp.p:
tou=t' w)=ga/q' e)chu/rhto kai\ sofw/tata:
oi( xh=nes u(potu/ptontes w(/sper tai=s a)/mais
e)s ta\s leka/nas e)ne/ballon au)toi=s toi=n podoi=n.

sp.speaker: *pisqe/tairos
sp.p: ti/ dh=ta po/des a)\n ou)k a)\n e)rgasai/ato;

sp.speaker: *)/aggelos *a
sp.p:
kai\ nh\ *di/' ai( nh=ttai/ ge periezwsme/nai
e)plinqofo/roun: a)/nw de\ to\n u(pagwge/a
e)pe/tont' e)/xousai kato/pin †w(/sper paidi/a
to\n phlo\n e)n toi=s sto/masin† ai( xelido/nes.

sp.speaker: *pisqe/tairos
*)/aggelos *a
sp.p:
o)/rniqes h)=san te/ktones
sofw/tatoi peleka=ntes, oi(\ toi=s r(u/gxesin
a)pepele/khsan ta\s pu/las: h)=n d' o( ktu/pos
au)tw=n pelekw/ntwn w(/sper e)n nauphgi/w|.
kai\ nu=n a(/pant' e)kei=na pepu/lwtai pu/lais
kai\ bebala/nwtai kai\ fula/ttetai ku/klw|,
e)fodeu/etai, kwdwnoforei=tai, pantaxh=|,
fulakai\ kaqesth/kasi kai\ fruktwri/ai
e)n toi=si pu/rgois. a)ll' e)gw\ me\n a)potre/xwn
a)poni/yomai: su\ d' au)to\s h)/dh ta)/lla dra=.

sp.speaker: *xoro/s
sp.p:
ou(=tos ti/ poiei=s; a)=ra qauma/zeis o(/ti
ou(/tw to\ tei=xos e)ktetei/xistai taxu/;

sp.speaker: *pisqe/tairos
sp.p:
nh\ tou\s qeou\s e)/gwge: kai\ ga\r a)/cion:
i)/sa ga\r a)lhqw=s fai/netai/ moi yeu/desin.
a)ll' o(/de fu/lac ga\r tw=n e)kei=qen a)/ggelos
e)sqei= pro\s h(ma=s deu=ro purri/xhn ble/pwn.

sp.speaker: *)/aggelos *b
sp.p: i)ou\ i)ou/, i)ou\ i)ou/, i)ou\ i)ou/.

sp.speaker: *pisqe/tairos
sp.p: ti/ to\ pra=gma touti/;

sp.speaker: *)/aggelos *b.
sp.p:
deino/tata pepo/nqamen.
tw=n ga\r qew=n tis a)/rti tw=n para\ tou= *dio\s
dia\ tw=n pulw=n ei)se/ptet' e)s to\n a)e/ra,
laqw\n koloiou\s fu/lakas h(merosko/pous.

sp.speaker: *pisqe/tairos
sp.p:
w)= deino\n e)/rgon kai\ sxe/tlion ei)rgasme/nos.
ti/s tw=n qew=n;

sp.speaker: *)/aggelos *b.
sp.p:
ou)k i)/smen: o(/ti d' ei)=xe ptera/,
tou=t' i)/smen.

sp.speaker: *pisqe/tairos
sp.p:
ou)/koun dh=ta peripo/lous e)xrh=n
pe/myai kat' au)to\n eu)qu/s;

sp.speaker: *)/aggelos *b.
sp.p:
a)ll' e)pe/myamen
trismuri/ous i(e/rakas i(ppotoco/tas,
xwrei= de\ pa=s tis o)/nuxas h)gkulwme/nos,
kerxnh\|s trio/rxhs gu\y ku/mindis ai)eto/s:
r(u/mh| te kai\ pteroi=si kai\ r(oizh/masin
ai)qh\r donei=tai tou= qeou= zhtoume/nou:
ka)/st' ou) makra\n a)/pwqen, a)ll' e)ntau=qa/ pou
h)/dh 'sti/n.

sp.speaker: *pisqe/tairos
sp.p:
ou)/koun sfendo/nas dei= lamba/nein
kai\ to/ca; xw/rei deu=ro pa=s u(phre/ths:
to/ceue pai=e, sfendo/nhn ti/s moi do/tw.

sp.speaker: *xoro/s
sp.p:
po/lemos ai)/retai, po/lemos ou) fato\s
pro\s e)me\ kai\ qeou/s. a)lla\ fu/latte pa=s
a)e/ra perine/felon, o(\n e)/rebos e)te/keto,
mh/ se la/qh| qew=n tis tau/th| perw=n:

sp.speaker: *xoro/s
sp.p:
a)/qrei de\ pa=s ku/klw| skopw=n,
w(s e)ggu\s h)/dh dai/monos pedarsi/ou
di/nhs pterwto\s fqo/ggos e)cakou/etai.

sp.speaker: *pisqe/tairos
sp.p:
au(/th su/, poi= poi= poi= pe/tei; me/n' h(/suxos,
e)/x' a)tre/mas: au)tou= sth=q': e)pi/sxes tou= dro/mou.
ti/s ei)=; podaph/; le/gein e)xrh=n o(po/qen po/t' ei)=.

sp.speaker: *)=iris
sp.p: para\ tw=n qew=n e)/gwge tw=n *)olumpi/wn.

sp.p: *pa/ralos h)\ *salamini/a;

tauthni/ tis ou) sullh/yetai

e)me\ sullh/yetai;
ti/ pot' e)sti\ touti\ to\ kako/n;

kata\ poi/as pu/las
ei)sh=lqes e)s to\ tei=xos w)= miarwta/th;

ou)de\ su/mbolon
e)pe/balen o)rni/qarxos ou)dei/s soi parw/n;

sp.speaker: *)=iris
sp.p: ma\ *di/' ou)k e)/moig' e)pe/balen ou)dei\s w)= me/le.

sp.speaker: *pisqe/tairos
sp.p:
ka)/peita dh=q' ou(/tw siwph=| diape/tei
dia\ th=s po/lews th=s a)llotri/as kai\ tou= xa/ous;

sp.speaker: *)=iris
sp.p: poi/a| ga\r a)/llh| xrh\ pe/tesqai tou\s qeou/s;

sp.speaker: *pisqe/tairos
sp.p:
ou)k oi)=da ma\ *di/' e)/gwge: th=|de me\n ga\r ou)/.
a)dikei=s de\ kai\ nu=n. a)=ra/ g' oi)=sqa tou=q' o(/ti
dikaio/tat' a)\n lhfqei=sa pasw=n *)iri/dwn
a)pe/qanes, ei) th=s a)ci/as e)tu/gxanes;

sp.speaker: *)=iris
sp.p: a)ll' a)qa/nato/s ei)m'.

sp.speaker: *pisqe/tairos
sp.p:
a)ll' o(/mws a)\n a)pe/qanes.
deino/tata ga/r toi peiso/mesq', e)moi\ dokei=,
ei) tw=n me\n a)/llwn a)/rxomen, u(mei=s d' oi( qeoi\
a)kolastanei=te, kou)de/pw gnw/sesq' o(/ti
a)kroate/on u(mi=n e)n me/rei tw=n kreitto/nwn.
fra/son de/ toi/ moi tw\ pte/ruge poi= naustolei=s;

sp.speaker: *)=iris
sp.p:
e)gw/; pro\s a)nqrw/pous pe/tomai para\ tou= patro\s
fra/sousa qu/ein toi=s *)olumpi/ois qeoi=s
mhlosfagei=n te bouqu/tois e)p' e)sxa/rais
knisa=n t' a)guia/s.

sp.speaker: *pisqe/tairos
sp.p: ti/ su\ le/geis; poi/ois qeoi=s;

sp.speaker: *)=iris
sp.p: poi/oisin; h(mi=n toi=s e)n ou)ranw=| qeoi=s.

sp.speaker: *pisqe/tairos
sp.p: qeoi\ ga\r u(mei=s;

sp.speaker: *)=iris
sp.p: ti/s ga/r e)st' a)/llos qeo/s;

sp.speaker: *pisqe/tairos
sp.p:
o)/rniqes a)nqrw/poisi nu=n ei)sin qeoi/,
oi(=s qute/on au)tou/s, a)lla\ ma\ *di/' ou) tw=| *dii/.

sp.speaker: *)=iris
sp.p:
w)= mw=re mw=re mh\ qew=n ki/nei fre/nas
deina/s, o(/pws mh/ sou ge/nos panw/leqron
*dio\s make/llh| pa=n a)nastre/yh| *di/kh,
lignu\s de\ sw=ma kai\ do/mwn periptuxa\s
kataiqalw/sh| sou *likumni/ais bolai=s.

sp.speaker: *pisqe/tairos
sp.p:
a)/kouson au(/th: pau=e tw=n paflasma/twn:
e)/x' a)tre/ma. fe/r' i)/dw, po/tera *ludo\n h)\ *fru/ga
tauti\ le/gousa mormolu/ttesqai dokei=s;
a)=r' oi)=sq' o(/ti *zeu\s ei)/ me luph/sei pe/ra,
me/laqra me\n au)tou= kai\ do/mous *)amfi/onos
kataiqalw/sw purfo/roisin ai)etoi=s;
pe/myw de\ porfuri/wnas e)s to\n ou)rano\n
o)/rnis e)p' au)to\n pardala=s e)nhmme/nous
plei=n e(cakosi/ous to\n a)riqmo/n. kai\ dh/ pote
ei(=s *porfuri/wn au)tw=| pare/sxe pra/gmata.
su\ d' ei)/ me luph/seis ti, th=s diako/nou
prw/ths a)natei/nas tw\ ske/lei diamhriw=
th\n *)=irin au)th/n, w(/ste qauma/zein o(/pws
ou(/tw ge/rwn w)\n stu/omai trie/mbolon.

sp.speaker: *)=iris
sp.p: diarragei/hs w)= me/l' au)toi=s r(h/masin.

sp.speaker: *pisqe/tairos
sp.p: ou)k a)posobh/seis; ou) taxe/ws; eu)ra\c pata/c.

sp.speaker: *)=iris
sp.p: h)= mh/n se pau/sei th=s u(/brews ou(mo\s path/r.

sp.speaker: *pisqe/tairos
sp.p:
oi)/moi ta/las. ou)/koun e(te/rwse petome/nh
kataiqalw/seis tw=n newte/rwn tina/;

sp.speaker: *xoro/s
sp.p:
a)pokeklh/|kamen diogenei=s qeou\s
mhke/ti th\n e)mh\n diapera=n po/lin,
mhde/ ge/ tin' i(ero/quton a)na\ da/pedon e)/ti
th=|de brotw=n qeoi=si pe/mpein kapno/n.

sp.speaker: *pisqe/tairos
sp.p:
deino/n ge to\n kh/ruka to\n para\ tou\s brotou\s
oi)xo/menon, ei) mhde/pote nosth/sei pa/lin.

sp.speaker: *kh=ruc
sp.p:
w)= *pisqe/tair' w)= maka/ri' w)= sofw/tate,
w)= kleino/tat' w)= sofw/tat' w)= glafurw/tate,
w)= trismaka/ri' w)= katake/leuson.

sp.speaker: *pisqe/tairos
sp.p: ti/ su\ le/geis;

sp.speaker: *kh=ruc
sp.p:
stefa/nw| se xrusw=| tw=|de sofi/as ou(/neka
stefanou=si kai\ timw=sin oi( pa/ntes lew/|.

sp.speaker: *pisqe/tairos
sp.p: de/xomai. ti/ d' ou(/tws oi( lew\| timw=si/ me;

sp.speaker: *kh=ruc
sp.p:
w)= kleinota/thn ai)qe/rion oi)ki/sas po/lin,
ou)k oi(=sq' o(/shn timh\n par' a)nqrw/pois fe/rei,
o(/sous t' e)rasta\s th=sde th=s xw/ras e)/xeis.
pri\n me\n ga\r oi)ki/sai se th/nde th\n po/lin,
e)lakwnoma/noun a(/pantes a)/nqrwpoi to/te,
e)ko/mwn e)pei/nwn e)rru/pwn e)swkra/toun
skuta/li' e)fo/roun, nuni\ d' u(postre/yantes au)=
o)rniqomanou=si, pa/nta d' u(po\ th=s h(donh=s
poiou=sin a(/per o)/rniqes e)kmimou/menoi:
prw=ton me\n eu)qu\s pa/ntes e)c eu)nh=s a(/ma
e)pe/tonq' e(/wqen w(/sper h(mei=s e)pi\ nomo/n:
ka)/peit' a)\n a(/ma kath=ran e)s ta\ bibli/a:
ei)=t' a)pene/mont' e)ntau=qa ta\ yhfi/smata.
w)rniqoma/noun d' ou(/tw perifanw=s w(/ste kai\
polloi=sin o)rni/qwn o)no/mat' h)=n kei/mena.
pe/rdic me\n ei(=s ka/phlos w)noma/zeto
xwlo/s, *meni/ppw| d' h)=n xelidw\n tou)/noma,
*)opounti/w| d' o)fqalmo\n ou)k e)/xwn ko/rac,
korudo\s *filokle/ei, xhnalw/phc *qeoge/nei,
i)=bis *lukou/rgw|, *xairefw=nti nukteri/s,
*surakosi/w| de\ ki/tta: *meidi/as d' e)kei=
o)/rtuc e)kalei=to: kai\ ga\r h)/|kein o)/rtugi
u(po\ stufoko/pou th\n kefalh\n peplhgme/nw|.
h)=|don d' u(po\ filorniqi/as pa/ntes me/lh,
o(/pou xelidw\n h)=n tis e)mpepoihme/nh
h)\ phne/loy h)\ xh/n tis h)\ peristera\
h)\ pte/ruges, h)\ pterou= ti kai\ smikro\n prosh=n.
toiau=ta me\n ta)kei=qen. e(\n de/ soi le/gw:
h(/cous' e)kei=qen deu=ro plei=n h)\ mu/rioi
pterw=n deo/menoi kai\ tro/pwn gamywnu/xwn:
w(/ste pterw=n soi toi=s e)poi/kois dei= poqe/n.

sp.speaker: *pisqe/tairos
sp.p:
ou)k a)=ra ma\ *di/' h(mi=n e)/t' e)/rgon e(sta/nai.
a)ll' w(s ta/xista su\ me\n i)w\n ta\s a)rri/xous
kai\ tou\s kofi/nous a(/pantas e)mpi/mplh pterw=n:
*manh=s de\ fere/tw moi qu/raze ta\ ptera/:
e)gw\ d' e)kei/nwn tou\s prosio/ntas de/comai.

sp.speaker: *xoro/s
sp.p:
taxu\ dh\ polua/nora ta/nde po/lin
kalei= tis a)nqrw/pwn.

sp.speaker: *pisqe/tairos
sp.p: tu/xh mo/non prosei/h.

sp.speaker: *xoro/s
sp.p: kate/xousi d' e)/rwtes e)ma=s po/lews.

sp.speaker: *pisqe/tairos
sp.p: qa/tton fe/rein keleu/w.

sp.speaker: *xoro/s
sp.p:
ti/ ga\r ou)k e)/ni tau/th|
kalo\n a)ndri\ metoikei=n;
*sofi/a *po/qos *)ambrosi/a *xa/rites
to/ te th=s a)gano/fronos *(hsuxi/as
eu)h/meron pro/swpon.

sp.speaker: *pisqe/tairos
sp.p: w(s blakikw=s diakonei=s: ou) qa=tton e)gkonh/seis;

sp.speaker: *xoro/s
sp.p:
fere/tw ka/laqon taxu/ tis pteru/gwn,
su\ d' au)=qis e)co/rma —

sp.speaker: *pisqe/tairos
sp.p: tu/ptwn ge tou=ton w(di/.

sp.speaker: *xoro/s
sp.p: pa/nu ga\r bradu/s e)sti/ tis w(/sper o)/nos.

sp.speaker: *pisqe/tairos
sp.p: *manh=s ga/r e)sti deilo/s.

sp.speaker: *xoro/s
sp.p:
su\ de\ ta\ ptera\ prw=ton
dia/qes ta/de ko/smw|,
ta/ te mousi/x' o(mou= ta/ te mantika\ kai\
ta\ qala/tti'. e)/peita d' o(/pws froni/mws
pro\s a)/ndr' o(rw=n pterw/seis.

sp.speaker: *pisqe/tairos
sp.p:
ou)/ toi ma\ ta\s kerxnh=|das e)/ti sou= sxh/somai,
ou(/tws o(rw=n se deilo\n o)/nta kai\ bradu/n.

sp.speaker: *patraloi/as
sp.p:
genoi/man ai)eto\s u(yipe/tas,
w(s a)mpotaqei/hn u(pe\r a)truge/tou
glauka=s e)p' oi)=dma li/mnas.

sp.speaker: *pisqe/tairos
sp.p:
e)/oiken ou) yeudaggelh/sein a(/ggelos.
a)/|dwn ga\r o(/de tis ai)etou\s prose/rxetai.

sp.speaker: *patraloi/as
sp.p:
ai)boi=:
ou)k e)/stin ou)de\n tou= pe/tesqai gluku/teron:
o)rniqomanw= ga\r kai\ pe/tomai kai\ bou/lomai
oi)kei=n meq' u(mw=n ka)piqumw= tw=n no/mwn.

sp.speaker: *pisqe/tairos
sp.p: poi/wn no/mwn; polloi\ ga\r o)rni/qwn no/moi.

sp.speaker: *patraloi/as
sp.p:
pa/ntwn: ma/lista d' o(/ti kalo\n nomi/zetai
to\n pate/ra toi=s o)/rnisin a)/gxein kai\ da/knein.

sp.speaker: *pisqe/tairos
sp.p:
kai\ nh\ *di/' a)ndrei=o/n ge pa/nu nomizomen,
o(\s a)\n peplh/gh| to\n pate/ra neotto\s w)/n.

sp.speaker: *patraloi/as
sp.p:
dia\ tau=ta me/ntoi deu=r' a)noikisqei\s e)gw\
a)/gxein e)piqumw= to\n pate/ra kai\ pa/nt' e)/xein.

sp.speaker: *pisqe/tairos
sp.p:
a)ll' e)/stin h(mi=n toi=sin o)/rnisin no/mos
palaio\s e)n tai=s tw=n pelargw=n ku/rbesin:
e)ph\n o( path\r o( pelargo\s e)kpethsi/mous
pa/ntas poih/sh| tou\s pelargide/as tre/fwn,
dei= tou\s neottou\s to\n pate/ra pa/lin tre/fein.

sp.speaker: *patraloi/as
sp.p:
a)pe/lausa/ ta)/ra nh\ *di/' e)lqw\n e)nqadi/,
ei)/per ge/ moi kai\ to\n pate/ra boskhte/on.

sp.speaker: *pisqe/tairos
sp.p:
ou)de/n g'. e)peidh/per ga\r h)=lqes w)= me/le
eu)/nous, pterw/sw s' w(/sper o)/rnin o)rfano/n.
soi\ d' w)= neani/sk' ou) kakw=s u(poqh/somai,
a)ll' oi(=a/per au)to\s e)/maqon o(/te pai=s h)=. su\ ga\r
to\n me\n pate/ra mh\ tu/pte: tauthndi\ labw\n
th\n pte/ruga kai\ touti\ to\ plh=ktron qa)te/ra|,
nomi/sas a)lektruo/nos e)/xein tondi\ lo/fon,
frou/rei strateu/ou misqoforw=n sauto\n tre/fe,
to\n pate/r e)/a zh=n: a)ll' e)peidh\ ma/ximos ei)=,
e)s ta)pi\ *qra/|khs a)pope/tou ka)kei= ma/xou.

sp.speaker: *patraloi/as
sp.p:
nh\ to\n *dio/nuson eu)= ge/ moi dokei=s le/gein,
kai\ pei/somai/ soi.

kai\ pw=s a)\n lo/gois

pa/ntes toi=s lo/gois
a)napterou=ntai.

ou)k a)kh/koas,
o(/tan le/gwsin oi( pate/res e(ka/stote

o( de/ tis to\n au(tou= fhsin e)pi\ tragw|di/a|

fh/m' e)gw/.
u(po\ ga\r lo/gwn o( nou=s te metewri/zetai

manqa/nw.
w(di\ le/geis: o(/pws a)\n w)flh/kh| di/khn

pa/nt' e)/xeis.
be/mbikos ou)de\n diafe/rein dei=.

manqa/nw
be/mbika: kai\ mh\n e)/sti moi nh\ to\n *di/a

pterw\ me\n ou)=n,
